name: Basil Seeds
about: Basil seeds grow into aromatic plants loved for their flavor and medicinal value. Great for indoor growing and boosting immunity, digestion, and freshness.

name: Sunflower Seeds
about: Sunflower seeds yield bright, sunny blooms and are also a healthy snack! The plant attracts pollinators, enhances garden appeal, and is very easy to grow.

name: Neem Seeds
about: Neem seeds grow into medicinal giants known for purifying air and soil. The tree fights bacteria, pests, and viruses naturally—an eco-warrior’s dream.

name: Coriander Seeds
about: Coriander seeds are used for their spice and to grow fragrant, tasty leaves. An excellent kitchen companion with cooling effects and rich antioxidants.

name: Tulsi Seeds (Holy Basil)
about: Tulsi is a sacred and medicinal plant revered in Ayurveda. Grows fast, repels insects, purifies air, and promotes respiratory and mental health.
